sourcesContent:
import "./ProcessStatus.css" import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { formatCurrency } from "../../helpers/number-helper" const ProcessStatus = ({ orderInfo, step }) => { console.log(orderInfo) return (

Your order status:

  • Date created: {orderInfo.orderTime}
  • Infomation Order: {orderInfo.deliveryInformation}
  • Total Price : {formatCurrency(orderInfo.totalPrice)}
Confirmed
Sent To Kitchen
Ready for Pickup
Ready for Delivery
Delivered
) } export default ProcessStatus
